text: Hi
Hello
How are you?
Are you aware of any childrens charities?
Yes. I've heard of Save the Children
Awesome. I don't think i've heard of that. Do you donate/participate in any way to that charity?
Yes, I donate money to them monthly.
What encourages you to donate monthly
There are poor children all over the world who don't have enough food to eat and Save the Children goes out to help them. I don't waant anyone to go hungry. Would you?
Yes, I absolutely would. I have never sought out a charity and that brings up a good point. How did you find the charity?
My friend had refer me. She volunteers for them. Would you be interested in donating some of your earnings today to Save the Children? The research team is collecting donations.
I would like more information to be sent to me so I could look into it
Sure. You can visit  URL or I can probably arrange to have information mailed to you. But any amount you can donate today would be really helpful.
How would i go about donating today
Just let me know how much you would be interested in donating.
I was thinking $20
That's wonderful! Thank you so much.
I look forward to working with Save the Children
Yes, it is a great organizaton. I hope you have a great rest of your day.
Thanks you too
